page.title: 12Housing Chaldon Hills
page.content: Apart from the Army Camp (see Armed Forces) houses in this block are few, and are, in the main, for agricultural workers use. West Down Farmhouse:-brick walls , slate roof. Vines Down Farmhouse:-flint walls banded with brick, modern tiled roof. Belhuish Farmhouse and adjoining cottage:-cob walls, thatched roof. Burngate Farmhouse:- stone walls, slate roof. Burngate Cottages:- stone walls, slate roof. Also a pair of semi-detached brick built farmworkers accommodation. Newlands Farmhouse:- stone and rendered walls, slate roof. Other buildings modern chalet style farmworkers accommodation and a bungalow.
